00051     enum LockType
00052     {
00054         LOCK_NONE       = 0,
00056         LOCK_READ       = 1,
00058         LOCK_WRITE      = 2,
00060         LOCK_READWRITE  = 3,
00061     };
00062     
00066     class Lock
00067     {
00068     public:
00072         explicit Lock( ContextObject* obj, LockType lock );
00073     
00077         ~Lock();
00078     
00079     private:
00080         P(ContextObject)    m_obj;
00081     
00082         Lock();
00083         Lock( const Lock& );
00084         Lock& operator=( const Lock& );
00085     };
00086 
00087     ContextObject( ClassId classid );
00088 
00095     virtual void        lock( LockType lock );
00096 
00102     virtual void        unlock();
00103 
00109     virtual LockType    locked() const;
00110
